INSTANT_REWARD_FREESPIN_ENABLED.NAME: Instant Reward Freespin Enabled
INSTANT_REWARD_FREESPIN_ENABLED.DESCRIPTION: Is this game enabled for Instant Reward Freespins

INSTANT_REWARD_NEW.INSTANT_REWARD_UNIT_VALUE_EXPLAIN: The unit value in cents ie). 10 would mean the reward is worth 10 cents
INSTANT_REWARD_NEW.INSTANT_REWARD_NUMBER_OF_UNITS_EXPLAIN: The number of units associated with the Instant Reward

INSTANT_REWARD_FREESPINS.INSTANT_REWARD_UNIT_VALUE_EXPLAIN: The unit value in cents ie). 10 would mean the reward is worth 10 cents
INSTANT_REWARD_FREESPINS.INSTANT_REWARD_NUMBER_OF_UNITS_EXPLAIN: The number of units associated with the Instant Reward Freespin

INSTANT_REWARDS_FREESPINS.NOGAMES: You have not chosen a game to be associated with the Instant Reward Freespin
INSTANT_REWARDS_FREESPINS.NO_NUMBER_OF_UNITS: You have not chosen the number of units to be associated with the Instant Reward Freespin
INSTANT_REWARDS_FREESPINS.NO_UNIT_VALUE: You have not chosen the unit value to be associated with the Instant Reward Freespin
